attributes.action: Scrap road pricing and start doing your job and get public transport properly organised!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am totally opposed to road pricing, motorists already pay unacceptable levels of tax. You have failed constantly to encourage alternative transport solutions, particularly in major towns. I like many, many people have had enough of taxation and your mismanagement of this countries finances, it is time to 'Get it right' and come up with a positive plan for the future that does not take even 'more' money out of the pockets of the people of this country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
